alert.note: Alert for Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:23PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Crook County through 800 PM MDT... At 723 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles southwest of Sundance, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sundance and Warren Peak. This includes Interstate 90 in Wyoming between Mile Markers 177 and 199. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
